Keep in mind that the air is full of ash from Grimmler's shuttle 
exploding. Also, there are two airborne Maximals.

::Prowl/Firearm::

Prowl had no trouble swirling out of the way of most of the shots 
fired at him, but several laser bolts hit him. He didn't slow down as 
he flew right above Wildrider, leaving two missiles to head for the 
bot. Prowl flew back toward the sky, ready to make another path.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm shielded himself with his arms, various laser shots and a 
shot from Triggerhappy hitting him. He growled, feeling the stinging 
of his bleeding armor.

Firearm smiled, watching Wildrider land. He swooped down toward the 
bot and muttered an activation code, transforming into his tank mode 
and flying down quick at the enemy. His heavy armor easily took the 
shots meant for it.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Wildrider sees Triggerhappy being blasted, "You want I should help 
him, or
> do you wanna" he asks to Drag Strip. "Lets just gut them" Drag 
Strip yells
> turning around, making a huge hole in the ground, and speeds towards
> Symphony to ram her. Meanwhile as hes going, his canons turn around 
and
> fire at prowl.
> 
> Wildrider lands and opens fire into the air towards the ariborn 
maximal,
> again filling the sky with lasers.
